Shoe Store Login Instructions Shoes List Shoe Details Welcome> Welcome to shoes app you have been logged in successfully 
 It is great to see you again 
 %s
• Login with your email address and password or create account 
 • Move To Shoe list screen 
 • you can see all added shoes from shoe list screen 
 • you can add new shoe from add shoe button 

Email@domain.com Password Email Login New Account Save Shoe Name Company Shoe Size Description our shoes list Logout no shoes to show please add new
